tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Competed as an amateur at the California Qualifying Tournament and earned medalist honours, securing exempt status for the season on the Mackenzie Tour. Made his professional debut at the Syncrude Boreal Open, shooting rounds of 72-72 to miss the cut...Rebounded with four straight top-15 finishes, shooting under par in 12 straight rounds...Shot a final-round 68 to record his first top 10 at The Players Cup, finishing T8.. Shared the first-round lead at the ATB Financial Classic and contended throughout the weekend before finishing T3. Finished the season 39th on the Order of Merit.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Compiled one of the most decorated careers in Horned Frogs history over four seasons at Texas Christian University...Was named a First Team All-American in each of 2012, 2013 and 2014 and was a finalist for the Ben Hogan Award in 2013...Became only the sixth amateur to ever win on the Challenge Tour, capturing a one-shot win at the 2013 ALLIANZ Golf Open Toulouse Metropole...Captured nine individual titles at TCU, a school record...Owns school records for career scoring average (70.44) and season scoring average (70.31, 2013).
tourBios.personal: Hopes to play Pine Valley someday...Was a three-time Academic All-American at TCU...Favorite pro sports team is the Dallas Stars...Dream foursome would include Justin Rose, Tiger Woods and Lee Westwood...Twitter handle is @JulienBrun06.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T3rd in 2015 at the ATB Financial Classic.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T51st in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
